languages.text: Бой начинается с фазы расстановки — в это время персонажи не могут атаковать или совершать другие действия, но могут занять выгодные позиции. Выберите персонажа, зажав {console_bind|LeftBottom} и переместив рамку на его портрет, и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Затем выделите клетку, куда хотите его переместить, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Красные клетки означают недоступную для персонажа зону. В раунд расстановки персонаж может перемещаться на максимум его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но не может подойти к врагу вплотную. Нажмите {console_bind|FuncAdditional}, чтобы начать бой.

traits.locale_text: Бой начинается с фазы расстановки — в это время персонажи не могут атаковать или совершать другие действия, но могут занять выгодные позиции. Выберите персонажа, зажав {console_bind|LeftBottom} и переместив рамку на его портрет, и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Затем выделите клетку, куда хотите его переместить, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Красные клетки означают недоступную для персонажа зону. В раунд расстановки персонаж может перемещаться на максимум его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но не может подойти к врагу вплотную. Нажмите , удерживая {console_bind|FuncAdditional}, чтобы начать бой.

languages.text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.
languages.original_text: Бой начинается с фазы расстановки — в это время персонажи не могут атаковать или совершать другие действия, но могут занять выгодные позиции. Выберите персонажа, зажав {console_bind|LeftBottom} и переместив рамку на его портрет, и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Затем выделите клетку, куда хотите его переместить, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Красные клетки означают недоступную для персонажа зону. В раунд расстановки персонаж может перемещаться на максимум его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но не может подойти к врагу вплотную. Нажмите {console_bind|FuncAdditional}, чтобы начать бой.

traits.locale_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

languages.text: El combate da comienzo con la fase táctica. En ella los personajes {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no pueden atacar{/g} ni realizar otras acciones, pero sí intentar adoptar medidas que los pongan en ventaja. Elige a un personaje manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moviendo el marco hasta su imagen y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Elige la casilla a la que quieras mover al personaje y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. El personaje no puede acceder a las casillas rojas. Durante la fase táctica, todos los personajes del grupo pueden emplear hasta su máximo de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse, pero no pueden situarse junto a un enemigo. Pulsa {console_bind|FuncAdditional} para comenzar la batalla.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: El combate da comienzo con la fase táctica. En ella los personajes no pueden atacar ni realizar otras acciones, pero sí intentar adoptar medidas que los pongan en ventaja. Elige a un personaje manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moviendo el marco hasta su imagen y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Elige la celda a la que quieras mover al personaje y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. El personaje no puede acceder a las zonas con celdas rojas. Durante la fase táctica, todos los personajes del grupo pueden emplear hasta su máximo de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse, pero no pueden situarse junto a un enemigo. Pulsa {console_bind|FuncAdditional} para comenzar la batalla.

languages.text: 戦闘は戦術フェーズから開始し、このフェイズ中、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃できず{/g}、他のアクションを取ることもできないが、有利な位置につこうとすることはできる。 {console_bind|LeftBottom}を押したままフレームをキャラクターのポートレートに移動させ、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離してキャラクターを選択する。キャラクターを移動させたいセルを選び、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。赤いセルは、キャラクターがアクセスできないエリアである。戦術フェーズ中、グループの各キャラクターは最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}まで移動できるが、敵に隣接することはできない。 {console_bind|FuncAdditional}を押して戦闘開始。
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘は戦術フェーズから開始され、このフェイズ中、キャラクターは攻撃や他のアクションを取ることはできないが、有利な位置につこうとすることはできる。 {console_bind|LeftBottom}を押したままフレームをキャラクターのポートレートに移動させ、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離してキャラクターを選択する。キャラクターを移動させたいセルを選び、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。赤いセルは、キャラクターがアクセスできないエリアである。戦術フェーズ中、グループの各キャラクターは最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}まで移動できるが、敵に隣接することはできない。 {console_bind|FuncAdditional}を押して戦闘開始。

languages.text: 每场战斗开始时都会有个战术阶段。战术阶段期间，所有角色都{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}{/g}无法攻击，也无法采取其他行动，但可以尝试占据有利位置。 按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，将边框移动到角色头像处，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}即可选择角色。选择需要让该角色前往的格子，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。红色格子代表角色无法前往的区域。战术阶段期间，队伍中的每位角色都可以以最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，但不能移动至与敌人相邻的位置。 按下{console_bind|FuncAdditional}开始战斗。
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗开始时都会有个战术阶段。战术阶段期间，所有角色都无法攻击，也无法采取其他行动，但可以尝试占据有利位置。 按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，将边框移动到角色头像处，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}即可选择角色。选择需要让该角色前往的格子，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。红色格子代表角色无法前往的区域。在战术阶段，队伍中的每位角色都可以以最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，但不能移动到敌人身边。 按下{console_bind|FuncAdditional}开始战斗。

languages.text: Der Kampf beginnt mit der taktischen Phase, in der die Charaktere {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g} oder andere Aktionen ausführen können, aber versuchen können, vorteilhafte Positionen einzunehmen. Wähle einen Charakter, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, den Rahmen zu seinem Porträt bewegst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Wähle das Feld aus, auf das sich der Charakter bewegen soll, und drücke dann {console_bind|Confirm}. Rote Felder sind Bereiche, die für den Charakter unzugänglich sind. Während der taktischen Phase darf sich jeder Charakter der Gruppe bis zu seiner maximalen Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} bewegen, aber er darf sich nicht neben einem Gegner positionieren. Drücke {console_bind|FuncAdditional}, um den Kampf zu beginnen.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: Der Kampf beginnt mit der taktischen Phase, in der die Charaktere nicht angreifen oder andere Aktionen ausführen können, aber versuchen können, vorteilhafte Positionen einzunehmen. Wähle einen Charakter, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, den Rahmen zu seinem Porträt bewegst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Wähle das Feld aus, auf das sich der Charakter bewegen soll, und drücke dann {console_bind|Confirm}. Rote Felder sind Bereiche, die für den Charakter unzugänglich sind. Während der taktischen Phase darf sich jeder Charakter der Gruppe bis zu seiner maximalen Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} bewegen, aber er darf sich nicht neben einem Gegner positionieren. Drücke {console_bind|FuncAdditional}, um den Kampf zu beginnen.

languages.text: Le combat commence par la phase tactique durant laquelle les personnages {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}ne peuvent ni attaquer{/g} ni effectuer d'autres actions, mais peuvent essayer d'adopter des positions avantageuses. Pour sélectionner un personnage, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, déplacez le cadre sur son portrait, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choisissez la case dans laquelle vous souhaitez que le personnage se déplace, puis appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Les cases rouges correspondent à des zones inaccessibles au personnage. Lors de la phase tactique, chaque personnage du groupe peut se déplacer à hauteur de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} maximum, mais ne peut pas se positionner à proximité d'un ennemi. Appuyez sur {console_bind|FuncAdditional} pour commencer le combat.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, moving the frame to their portrait, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choose the cell you want the character to move to, then press {console_bind|Confirm}. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press {console_bind|FuncAdditional} to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: Le combat commence par la phase tactique durant laquelle les personnages ne peuvent ni attaquer ni effectuer d'autres actions, mais peuvent essayer de prendre des positions avantageuses. Pour sélectionner un personnage, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, déplacez le cadre sur son portrait, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Choisissez la case dans laquelle vous souhaitez que le personnage se déplace, puis appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Les cases rouges correspondent à des zones inaccessibles au personnage. Lors de la phase tactique, chaque personnage du groupe peut se déplacer à hauteur de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, mais ne peut pas se positionner à proximité d'un ennemi. Appuyez sur {console_bind|FuncAdditional} pour commencer le combat.
